name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Meet Push to Talk from Any Window

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Temporary unmute google meet by pressing Ctrl+Shift+0

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Need a Google Meetâ„¢ Push-To-Talk that works from any window?
This is what you need.

To temporary turn on the microphone from any window, use Ctrl+Shift+0 (this combination is used so that it does not override shortcut from other applications)

To temporary turn on the microphone from Meetâ„¢ window, you can use Space bar instead of Ctrl+Shift+0. Don't worry, it won't affect the microphone status if you are typing in the chat box ðŸ˜‰

You can choose between Push-To-Talk mode or Toggle Mode from the options.
